name: Steel Love XII: A World in Ruin
name_original: Steel Love XII: A World in Ruin
description:
Steel Love XII: A World in Ruin is an Action adventure game created for the Robot Party Game Jam 2022.

Play as Charlene in the distant future as she uncovers the secrets behind the Great Calamity that ruined the world hundreds of years ago.
Explore the ruins of an ancient high tech society and discover Charlene's ties to events that led to the end of the world.

Playable with both kb&m and controllers.

Additional Info:

If you run either into state where you get stuck and cant progress, you can either select restart from checkpoint or press the END key to respawn, checkpoints are fairly generous, you dont lose any collectibles you find between checkpoints.

You can also use the INS key to open a cheat menu where you can turn on god mode or peaceful mode, peaceful mode only applies to regular enemies and might not work if they have already seen you.

The open world is mostly there for show, any areas worth going to should be marked on the map with a yellow dot.
